S.FORM: gaga utux Bbwan ro utux Gaga gaga na klhang kwe ga cn'rxan na utux gaga ro nya tna' mubuy gaga na utux Bbwan naha, baley ga utux sali, ini ga sa'ing sali ga musa utux na utux Gaga, piyux ga cn'rxan na msyow mpuw sali uy, lalu na mwah klahang gaga kwe ga mrhow na utux Bbwan. baley ci pntyagan na mrhow utux gaga kwe ga nya rmow tiyow yow na gaga snhyan ro gaga na Psani', kwara yow yhe, mrhow ga pyanga baley mwah ruruw mtiyow, kwara yow ptyagan nya ga yani ci: (1) mwah sbaley yow na cyoli wa hmiri'gaga, yani ci wa m'apal, tkruw cyoli, wa p'ilis cyoli, ttuwow, mulu yow, ini sble'iy yow ga ksa'ang ita Lutux bnkisan, ro phogan nya ita Tayal. (2) pgleng shri'an na utux Gaga ro yow na usa tmwang utux Gaga binah. (3) gaga utux Bbwan gmluw musa mluyak, musa Mgaga, iyat ga musa mtiri' paris, mrhow utux Gaga hiya ga musa mtama mrhow naha uy. (4) musa sbaley pc'unan na utux tnuxan.ro yow na hn'ilan mbahing. Bnrwan qa galan cpung Yawi Nomin .( : . 101)
